featured.text: He then coated the glue on a paper sample and found that it was not only a good bookmark, but it was great for writing notes.

definition.zh_def: 一種書寫的記錄，用於提醒或記錄信息。
definition.en_def: A written record used to remind or document information.
definition.example: Please take note of the meeting time.
